author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: يَا إِلَهِي هَذِهِ أَمَتُكَ وَابْنَةُ أَمَتِكَ الَّتِي آمَنَتْ بِكَ وَبِآيَاتِكَ وَتَوَجَّهَتْ إِلَيْكَ مُنْقَطِعَةً عَنْ سِوَاكَ * إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ أَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِينَ *
translation: O my God! This is Thy handmaiden and the daughter of Thy handmaiden who hath believed in Thee and in Thy signs, and set her face towards Thee, wholly detached from all except Thee. Thou art, verily, of those who show mercy the most merciful.
